```{r setup, message=F}
library(dplyr)
library(mapview)
library(sf)
library(tbeptools)
```

## `sealevelstations`

```{r}
sealevelstations

pts_sl <- sealevelstations |> 
  st_as_sf(
    coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), 
    crs    = 4326)

mapView(tbsegshed, zcol = "long_name") +
  mapView(pts_sl, zcol = "station_name")
```

## `read_importsealevels()`

```{r}
path_csv <- tempfile("sealevels", fileext=".csv")

df_sl <- read_importsealevels(path_csv)
df_sl
```


```{r}
df_sl |> 
  group_by(station_id, station_name) |> 
  summarise(
    date_min = min(date), 
    date_max = max(date), 
    .groups = "drop")
```
